file_insights.purpose: Spanish language translation file for BuilderOps application
file_insights.translation_coverage: 20 keys translated from English to Spanish

patterns_discovered.description: Hierarchical JSON structure for translations with nested objects by domain (app, nav)
patterns_discovered.evidence: Root object contains 'app' and 'nav' keys with nested translation strings

patterns_discovered.description: All navigation menu items consistently translated under 'nav' parent key
patterns_discovered.evidence: 15 navigation menu items (dashboard, projects, equipment, etc.) under single 'nav' object

patterns_discovered.description: Application designed to support multiple language files in parallel locales directory
patterns_discovered.evidence: File created in frontend/src/i18n/locales/ directory structure, suggesting other language files (en.json, etc.) exist

gotchas_discovered.description: Spanish translations contain special characters (á in 'Plataforma', ú in 'Configuración') requiring proper UTF-8 encoding
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: JSON file format natively supports UTF-8, ensuring proper handling

gotchas_discovered.description: Acronyms like 'RFIs' left untranslated in Spanish text, which may be intentional for technical terms
gotchas_discovered.note: Common pattern for industry-specific acronyms to remain in English

gotchas_discovered.description: Only 20 keys translated; application likely has more translation keys if English version is more comprehensive
gotchas_discovered.note: Future translations may be needed as feature set expands

approach_outcome.strategy: Created new Spanish locale file with consistent naming and structure following existing i18n conventions
approach_outcome.execution: Single file creation with 20 translated key-value pairs organized in logical domain structure

recommendations.recommendation: Verify all application text strings are included in translation file by comparing with English locale
Conduct Spanish language review with native speaker to ensure idiomatic accuracy and consistency
Document translation key naming conventions and domain organization for future locale additions
Test Spanish locale switching in UI to verify all translated strings display correctly without encoding issues
